main.name: Divyesh Patel
main.description: I'm Passionate about building Web applications and solving complex business problems

projects.title: !PetsLiFestyLE
projects.description: !PeTsLifestyLE is the website Created Using Rails, Bootstrap, and PostgreSQL. The main goal for this project was to create a website where users can read and write an article about pets. Users can also vote and comment on an article but to do that users need to signup and login.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: Netflix Clone using ReactJs, TMDB API. The main goal for this project was to make a website identical to Netflix using React and pulling data from TMDB API. Users can also watch available movie trailers.

projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.description: COVID-19 Tracker using ReactJs, disease.sh COVID-19 API. The main goal for this project was to show all the Active, Recovered, and Death cases in the country.

other_projects.title: Paathyakram
other_projects.description: Paathyakram is a website Created Using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap. This project is a front-end project with pure HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap.

other_projects.title: TIC TAC TOE
other_projects.description: Tic Tac Toe Game Developed using Ruby. It was a collaborative project to test the OOP concept Using Ruby.
